response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe is truly exceptional and holds significant value for you. This product is not just any item; it's a masterpiece that aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. Given its immense worth to you, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to you and my valuation, aiming to be fair to both parties while ensuring a profitable transaction for me. I trust this offer will resonate with your expectations and look forward to discussing further details with you.", "product_price": 950000}
